author: Kimeko McCoy
title: In Q1, marketers pivot to spending backed by AI and measurement
description: Q1 budget shifts reflect marketers’ growing focus on data, AI, measurement and where branding actually pays off.
content: Between mass layoffs and shaken consumer confidence, brand advertisers are cautiously wading through the first weeks of 2026. With consumer demand harder to predict, advertisers are looking for clear… [+3727 chars]

author: Mitchell Parton
title: Why Walmart is basically a tech company now
description: Walmart moved to join the Nasdaq exchange, also home to massive technology companies like Amazon, last December.
content: After building up fast-growing e-commerce and advertising businesses, moving its stock to the Nasdaq, and, as of Tuesday, crossing $1 trillion in valuation, Walmart is starting to look a lot more lik… [+4159 chars]

title: Cleaning Up CTV Supply: A Publisher’s Guide To Reducing Ad Fraud
